meanings.sent1: In our family, cousinage is important because we all grew up together.
meanings.sent2: My cousinage includes five cousins on my mom's side.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the cousinage took over the backyard with their games.
meanings.sent4: The bond of cousinage is like a strong chain that connects us all.
meanings.sent5: The cousinage gatherings are always filled with laughter and stories.

meanings.sent1: The cousinage between us makes family gatherings so much fun.
meanings.sent2: Growing up, I always enjoyed the cousinage between my siblings and me.
meanings.sent3: The cousinage at the party made it feel like a mini family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The cousinage we share brings us closer together, like a special club.
meanings.sent5: The cousinage bond is a unique connection that lasts a lifetime.

meanings.sent1: Our cousinage gets together every summer for a big picnic.
meanings.sent2: The cousinage is planning a surprise birthday party for our grandma.
meanings.sent3: The cousinage decided to put on a play for the family talent show.
meanings.sent4: The cousinage always has a blast when we go on camping trips together.
meanings.sent5: The cousinage is like a big, loving family within our extended family.
